forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 51. West wind around 3 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. West wind 2 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, a muted gray sky clings to the city, draped in a gentle veil of clouds. The air is cool, resting just above fifty, with a tranquil west wind whispering through the streets. Residents can expect the clouds to dissolve as the sun rises higher, promising clarity and warmth that peaks around sixty-three. However, the gentle descent into afternoon will usher in a slight chill, reminiscent of the city's whimsical weather dance.

The morning's soft cloud cover brings an unhurried ambiance, making it a perfect time for a quiet stroll along the Embarcadero or perhaps savoring an early cup of coffee at a local café, where the aroma of fresh pastries lingers in the air. Light layers will serve well throughout the day—an invitation to embrace this serene in-between season. As the afternoon beckons, one might find joy in visiting one of the many parks, where the sun's rays beckon and laughter mingles with the cool breeze. Don’t forget to keep an eye open for patches of fog clinging to the hills, enhancing the picturesque charm that is San Francisco.
